verses.verse: And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go up <WH5927> <WH8798> to Beit-El <WH1008>, and dwell <WH3427> <WH8798> there: and make <WH6213> <WH8798> there an altar <WH4196> unto 'Elohim <WH410>, that appeared <WH7200> <WH8737> unto thee when thou fleddest <WH1272> <WH8800> from the face <WH6440> of Esav <WH6215> thy brother <WH251>.

Then Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his household <WH1004>, and to all that were with him, Put away <WH5493> <WH8685> the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430> that are among you <WH8432>, and be clean <WH2891> <WH8690>, and change <WH2498> <WH8685> your garments <WH8071>:

And let us arise <WH6965> <WH8799>, and go up <WH5927> <WH8799> to Beit-El <WH1008>; and I will make <WH6213> <WH8799> there an altar <WH4196> unto 'Elohim <WH410>, who answered <WH6030> <WH8802> me in the day <WH3117> of my distress <WH6869>, and was with me in the way <WH1870> which I went <WH1980> <WH8804>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> all the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430> which were in their hand <WH3027>, and all their earrings <WH5141> which were in their ears <WH241>; and Ya`akov <WH3290> hid <WH2934> <WH8799> them under the oak <WH424> which was by SH'khem <WH7927>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799>: and the terror <WH2847> of 'Elohim <WH430> was upon the cities <WH5892> that were round about <WH5439> them, and they did not pursue <WH7291> <WH8804> after <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290>.
So Ya`akov <WH3290> came <WH935> <WH8799> to Luz <WH3870>, which is in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, that is, Beit-El <WH1008>, he and all the people <WH5971> that were with him.

And he built <WH1129> <WH8799> there an altar <WH4196>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> the place <WH4725> Elbethel <WH416>: because there 'Elohim <WH430> appeared <WH1540> <WH8738> unto him, when he fled <WH1272> <WH8800> from the face <WH6440> of his brother <WH251>.

But D'vorah <WH1683> Rebekah's <WH7259> nurse <WH3243> <WH8688> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and she was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> beneath Beit-El <WH1008> under an oak <WH437>: and the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> <WH8799> Allonbachuth <WH439>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> again, when he came <WH935> <WH8800> out of Padanaram <WH6307>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> him.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Thy name <WH8034> is Ya`akov <WH3290>: thy name <WH8034> shall not be called <WH7121> <WH8735> any more Ya`akov <WH3290>, but Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall be thy name <WH8034>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am 'Elohim <WH410> Almighty <WH7706>: be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8798> and multiply <WH7235> <WH8798>; a nation <WH1471> and a company <WH6951> of nations <WH1471> shall be of thee, and kings <WH4428> shall come <WH3318> <WH8799> out of thy loins <WH2504>;

And the land <WH776> which I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> Avraham <WH85> and Yitz'chak <WH3327>, to thee I will give it <WH5414> <WH8799>, and to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> the land <WH776>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from him in the place <WH4725> where he talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with him.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> set up <WH5324> <WH8686> a pillar <WH4676> in the place <WH4725> where he talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with him, even a pillar <WH4678> of stone <WH68>: and he poured <WH5258> <WH8686> a drink offering <WH5262> thereon, and he poured <WH3332> <WH8799> oil <WH8081> thereon.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> where 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> with him, Beit-El <WH1008>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Beit-El <WH1008>; and there was but <WH5750> a little <WH3530> way <WH776> to come <WH935> <WH8800> to Ephrath <WH672>: and Rachel <WH7354> travailed <WH3205> <WH8799>, and she had hard <WH7185> <WH8762> labour <WH3205> <WH8800>.

And it came to pass, when she was in hard <WH7185> <WH8687> labour <WH3205> <WH8800>, that the midwife <WH3205> <WH8764> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not; thou shalt have this son <WH1121> also.

And it came to pass, as her soul <WH5315> was in departing <WH3318> <WH8800>, (for she died <WH4191> <WH8804> ) that she called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Benoni <WH1126>: but his father <WH1> called <WH7121> <WH8804> him Binyamin <WH1144>.
And Rachel <WH7354> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was buried <WH6912> <WH8735> in the way <WH1870> to Ephrath <WH672>, which is Beit-Lechem <WH1035>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> set <WH5324> <WH8686> a pillar <WH4676> upon her grave <WH6900>: that is the pillar <WH4678> of Rachel's <WH7354> grave <WH6900> unto this day <WH3117>.
And Yisra'EL <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799>, and spread <WH5186> <WH8799> his tent <WH168> beyond <WH1973> the tower <WH4026> of Edar <WH4029>.

And it came to pass, when Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH7931> <WH8800> in that land <WH776>, that Re'uven <WH7205> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and lay <WH7901> <WH8799> with Bilhah <WH1090> his father's <WH1> concubine <WH6370>: and Yisra'EL <WH3478> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it. Now the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290> were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>:

The sons <WH1121> of Leah <WH3812>; Re'uven <WH7205>, Ya`akov's <WH3290> firstborn <WH1060>, and SHim`on <WH8095>, and Levi <WH3878>, and Y'hudah <WH3063>, and Yissakhar <WH3485>, and Z'vulun <WH2074>:
The sons <WH1121> of Rachel <WH7354>; Yosef <WH3130>, and Binyamin <WH1144>:
And the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, Rachel's <WH7354> handmaid <WH8198>; Dan <WH1835>, and Naftali <WH5321>:

And the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, Leah's <WH3812> handmaid <WH8198>; Gad <WH1410>, and Asher <WH836>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, which were born <WH3205> <WH8795> to him in Padanaram <WH6307>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> came <WH935> <WH8799> unto Yitz'chak <WH3327> his father <WH1> unto Mamre <WH4471>, unto the city of Arbah <WH7153>, which is Hevron <WH2275>, where Avraham <WH85> and Yitz'chak <WH3327> sojourned <WH1481> <WH8804>.
And the days <WH3117> of Yitz'chak <WH3327> were an hundred <WH3967> <WH8141> and fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> gave up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8799>, and died <WH4191> <WH8799>, and was gathered <WH622> <WH8735> unto his people <WH5971>, being old <WH2205> and full <WH7649> of days <WH3117>: and his sons <WH1121> Esav <WH6215> and Ya`akov <WH3290> buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him.
